column2: an A.M. Eatery////I got takeout from Snooze while I was visiting Houston last weekend. We ordered online and picked up in the restaurant. The process was painless
column3: and our order was ready when we arrived! I got the Egg White Scramble with avocado
column5: and soyrizo with hashbrowns - it was delicious! My boyfriend got the Spuds Deluxe with chicken sausage
column7: and scrambled eggs - he said it was really good. I wish I lived in Houston so I could become a regular here!
